contentList.content: Coop-Dialog Switches
Click this to enable force-pulling all players into dialogs (main feature), aswell as add another toggle for random dialog rolling.
Coop-Dialog Rolls
Click this to toggle dialog rolling options.
Dialog Method: Vanilla
Dialog starter always owns dialog ownership.
Dialog Method: Random
Dialog ownership is rolled amongst all active characters randomly and with no modifiers.
Dialog Method: Roll Initiative
Dialog ownership is rolled amongst all active characters based on initiative.
Dialog Method: Roll Charisma
Dialog ownership is rolled amongst all active characters based on charisma.
Dialog Preference: Opt-in
Dialog methos will only be applied to characters who manually opt-in.
Dialog Preference: Include Followers
Speaking to camp followers will be included in the roll for dialog.
Dialog Preference: Limit Distance
Limit this mod's features to characters within earshot.
Dialog Preference: Disable mod
Disable every modification this mod does.
Dialog Listeners: Opt-In
If Host enabled opt-in preference, this is the opt-in for clients
